Trade/Device Name(s): cobas® Cdiff Nucleic Acid Test for use on the cobas® Liat® System
Regulation Name(s): Clostridium Difficile Toxin Gene Amplification Assay
Specimen Container(s): cobas® PCR Media Swab Sample Kit
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Silica magnetic particle-based nucleic acid extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas® Cdiff nucleic acid test utilizing real-time PCR to detect C. difficile toxin B gene in stool on the cobas® Liat® System
Indications for Use Summary: Automated qualitative in vitro diagnostic test using real-time PCR to detect toxin B (tcdB) gene of toxigenic Clostridioides difficile in unformed stool specimens from patients suspected of C. difficile infection, as an aid in diagnosis used with clinical and epidemiological risk factors
